title: Distracting Music
description:
Scott Zolak trended on Friday after saying that Cam Newton was too distracted by rap music. Chad Finn, "sports media columnist," has not written one word about the comments. Kirk announces a live taping of the podcast with Gerry Callahan following the 'Step Up for Colleen 5K.' Moving on to Saco IV. Tickets on-sale at MinifanHQ.com. Calls & much more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
